title: The Private Emotions Trilogy Romance Novels
description: Erotic Romance (contains adult content)The Private Emotions Trilogy Romance Novels Little does Emily Harris realise how much a single cup of coffee with her best friend will completely change the course of her life. Emily begins a journey that will ultimately test her sexual boundaries and throw her into the path of the enigma known as Ethan Sterling.Ethan exposes Emily to inner circles that she never knew existed, a life beyond her imagination and passion that cannot be tamed. Can Emily learn the lessons she is meant to learn from Ethan before the intensity of him completely destroys her? (Please note that these novels are erotic romance novels : they contain adult content)
author: Elize Amornette
